channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Brandi Cyrus Announces Engagement to Matt Southcombe: ‘Love You Forever’
item.description: “I’m so thankful everyday that my flight got cancelled and I walked into this coffee shop one afternoon and found you,” Cyrus said

item.title: Queen of 'RichTok' Becca Bloom Posts Haul of Christmas Gifts from Husband, Including Over $40K Worth of Couture Clothing
item.description: The content creator and software engineer has garnered millions of followers across platforms for sharing her over-the-top lifestyle

item.title: Pat Finn's Daughter Honors “The Middle” Actor After His Death at 60: 'A Role Model and an Inspiration'
item.description: The actor died on Monday, Dec. 22, after a years-long battle with cancer

item.title: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend Unwrap Presents with Their 4 Kids as They Celebrate Christmas Together
item.description: The couple share daughters Esti and Luna, as well as sons Miles and Wren
